footerDescription: FoxLine specializes in shipping goods and parcels, offering commercial mediation and transport services across Europe — especially from Germany.
heroSectionDescription: Our expert team and smart logistics platform ensure every shipment arrives safely, on time, and across the world — from Libya to Germany and beyond.
trackYourOrderDescription: Track your parcel in real time by entering your tracking number.
seaShippingDescription: Efficient ocean freight solutions for bulk cargo and containers — tailored for cross-border delivery, full tracking, and competitive rates.
airfreightDescription: Priority air freight for time-sensitive shipments with end-to-end visibility, customs assistance, and global reach.
externalMediationDescription: Reliable mediation between clients, carriers, and customs to keep your shipments on track and your partnerships strong.
shippingPricesDescription: Enter your shipping details to instantly view pricing tailored to your route and package.
connectDescription: We bridge the gap between you and your partners — locally and internationally — with real-time communication and reliable coordination.
storeDescription: From short-term to long-term storage, we manage your inventory with precision, security, and full visibility at every step.
shippingDescription: Whether it’s a single pallet or full containers, we ship with care, speed, and real-time tracking across every route.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {length} characters
fullNameMinLength: Full Name must be at least {length} characters
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email to reset your password
OTPVerificationDescription: Check your email to see the verification code
